thread.section_title: Intoxalock Reviews | Customer Service Reviews of Intoxalock | intoxalock.com
thread.title: scott hampton

author: scott hampton
title: scott hampton
text: I have worked with Spencer since the very beginning of the process. He has always been very courteous, polite, and helpful. I have called with several questions because of concerns and bad reviews I had read on the internet. He answered all of my questions to my satisfaction and was very reassuring about all of my concerns. I have had the unit in my vehicle for a few days now and have had absolutely no problems with it and with my work I start and stop and restart multiple times throughout the day. Thanks to Spencer for being so helpful and reassuring through the whole process.
